review_data.title: Super Essen - Sehr nette Bedienung
review_data.content: Die Bedienung war sehr nett und zuvorkommend. Das Essen hervorragend. Schade bin ich nicht oft in Zürich. Weiter so!!

review_data.title: Leckere, frische Gerichte
review_data.content: Ich war mit einer Gruppe von Asiaten im Siam Square Bistro. Ein von der Möblierung einfaches Lokal mit offener Küche....More

review_data.title: Good, but not excellent
review_data.content: Small and pretty place. Very friendly and quick service, however food is not the best to my taste. Pets are not welcomed due to open kitchen, which is understandable.

review_data.title: Great food, friendly service
review_data.content: Thrilled to discover this place, close to Zurich airport. Mostly take out but we got an outdoors table. Food was tasty and service was excellent and friendly.

review_data.title: 泰式餐廳
review_data.content: 服務很好的餐廳。可以試試看他們的泰式河粉...More

review_data.title: Lecker Curry
review_data.content: Klein aber fein! Nichts zum lange Verweilen, eher für die schnelle Mittagspause oder um es zuhause oder hinten auf der...More

review_data.title: Restaurant thaï de qualité à Zurich
review_data.content: Je vous conseille de venir Déjeuner ou dîner au SIAM Square Bistro . Accueil très sympathique et professionnel, multilingues et...More

review_data.title: a hidden treasure!
review_data.content: great Thai food, but opening hours are limited. Cooking is being done in-sight so you can see how the dish is handled. If you like spicy you can get it as good as you like it :) highly recommended!

review_data.title: Yummie Thai Food
review_data.content: We stumbled across this gem, which is a fairly new bistro and take away and happens to be 5 minutes from our home. What a find! We picked up our take away, very genuine Thai cuisine, in our opinion amongst the best in Zurich. When...More

review_data.title: While on meeting at Marriott
review_data.content: My wife and I bumped into this restaurant by chance. We straight away understood that it was going to be good since a big table of thailandese people was sitting there. And it was great! The best Thai restaurant so far in Switzerland where we...More

review_data.title: Super Preis/Leistung
review_data.content: Super leckeres, hausgemachtes Curry zu echt fairen Preisen. Und die Inhaberin und Mitarbeiter sind alle sehr herzlich und freundlich. Wir...More

review_data.title: Great Lunch Bistro
review_data.content: Nice small Bistro, where you can also take away. The food is nice and tastes tremendous , the sitting area is comfortable, the service is very friendly and the prices are fair. Worth a visit. Their Red Thai curry is great!

review_data.title: "Lovely dinner"
review_data.content: Restaurant itself it's very small but cosy. Staff is very kind and helpful. Food is very good: fresh, authentic Thai and delicious. They have as well a selection of Thai beers. I strongly recommend all curries with vegetables and chicken satay! I will come back...More

review_data.title: Siam square bistro
review_data.content: Excellent food. Lovely service. Good price. Green curry was really good. Very very fresh. Worth a visit if your close by.

review_data.title: Fantastic new place
review_data.content: This friendly new Thai restaurant is near our offices I have had lunch here past two days - fantastic fish curry and lovely friendly staff. Basic lay out but well worth a visit.
